entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse 1918Trump has "zero" idea if coronavirus is  coming back in the Fall  , the scientist - Doctors don't know  ! the "1918" Spanish Flu came back devastatingly in the fall , 50 Million died w/ the Spanish Flu !
